mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(post_no, user_no, board_title, board_text, game_map, game_mode, board_date, cru_max) VALUES (post_no.NEXTVAL, #{user_no}, #{board_title},#{board_text},#{game_map},#{game_mode}, sysdate, #{cru_max})
mapper.select: SELECT post_no FROM (SELECT post_no FROM BOARD WHERE user_no = #{value} ORDER BY post_no DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
